short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dezshop tool for inventory management and marketing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool used for researching price, availability, number of sold items, images, description and other details for car parts. The tool lets users quickly search car parts based on the manufacturer part number, it is used by highlighting the desired OEM number and then choosing the desired resource from the options panel. It includes several websites for new and used car parts.
